home.title: Hi! I'm Asha
home.description:
Hey there ðŸ™‹ Thank you for stopping by.\
I'm a curious soul who enjoys learning about new trends in the market and software products that offer solutions to simple everyday problems. My current interest revolves around software project management, product life cycle, product branding, strategy, marketing and monetization.

I'm trying my hands in project management lately. You would see some raw, real time experiences about project management on this blog. 

I hope to keep you entertained and be informative at the same time.
